meanings.definition: A loose outer garment worn by Muslim women.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful simar to the mosque.
meanings.sent2: The simar fluttered in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: The colorful simar caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: Her simar was like a flowing river of fabric.
meanings.sent5: The intricate embroidery on her simar was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: She liked to simar herself up for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: He tends to simar in bright colors for parties.
meanings.sent3: She decided to simar up for the costume party as a disco queen.
meanings.sent4: His outfit was so simarred that it could be seen from afar.
meanings.sent5: The way she simarred herself made heads turn wherever she went.
